DarkMouse::

She frowned and went down the hall to the chamber room.  She went to 
the console and activated one of them.  After adjusting all the 
settings, she stepping into the chamber and started to repair.  All 
the while, replaying the events in her mind. FOr some reason, things 
didn't make too much sence. If Galvatron couldn't stop two dragons, 
then why was she still here? she wasn't following the strongest 
leader. She smiled at the thought of breaking his codes and getting 
into his computer main frame. On the other hand, she hadn't really 
spent enough time with this leader to give him a fair appraisal. 
After all, she had to spent time with KitKat's group before really 
placing any kind of trust in that dog. Well, wolf. Anyway, she would 
stay longer with this one. Perhaps she might be able to get him to 
give her the codes later on once she gained his trust. then again, 
what Decepticon ever trusted one another. She sighed and decided to 
bide her time and see what would happen. In the mean time, she was 
going to get back to 100% in the chamber. 




--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron and the rest arrived at the base. They walked in and 
Galvatron was 
> now in a very bad mood. he didnt say anything. He just replayed 
what happened 
> on the screen. They never should have even went. It was way too 
late. He 
> would have to upgrade his scanners. He looked at disgust and the 
horrible 
> tactics they had used. So sloppy. He turned to Darkmouse. "Go and 
get 
> repaired. Then I will have another mission for you."  He turned to 
God 
> neptune. "YOu go in the simulator and train." He looked at 
Guieldart. "How is 
> our second plan going?" Guiledart smiled. "Good hes on his way." 
Galvatron 
> had a shimmer of a smile then it faded as fast as it came. He went 
back to 
> the tatics computer and watched to see if any new happening have 
occured. He 
> suddenly reliazed something. "Shredder!" he sent a comm out. "Where 
in the 
> pit are you youve been gone for mega cycles."
